MultiFeature.Name: Third Eye
MultiFeature.Text: You create a third, psychic eye in your mind, which you cast out into the world. It channels thoughts and knowledge back to you, greatly enhancing your senses.

Feature.Name: Third Eye - Psychic Focus
Feature.Text: While focused on this discipline, you have darkvision with a range of 60 feet. If you already have darkvision with that range or greater, increase its range by 10 feet.

Feature.Name: Third Eye - Tremorsense (2 psi; conc., 1 min.)
Feature.Text: As a bonus action, you gain tremorsense with a radius of 30 feet, which lasts until your concentration ends.

Feature.Name: Third Eye - Unwavering Eye (2 psi)
Feature.Text: As a bonus action, you gain advantage on Wisdom checks for 1 minute.

Feature.Name: Third Eye - Piercing Sight (3 psi; conc., 1 min.)
Feature.Text: As a bonus action, you gain the ability to see through objects that are up to 1 foot thick within 30 feet of you. This sight lasts until your concentration ends.

Feature.Name: Third Eye - Truesight (5 psi; conc., 1 min.)
Feature.Text: As a bonus action, you gain truesight with a radius of 30 feet, which lasts until your concentration ends.
